specifications.Care Advice: Knit When you receive a knit product, it may be stiff and wrinkled. This is because the fabric has been folded and compressed for shipping. To soften and straighten the fabric, you should condition it for 2-3 days at room temperature before using it.
specifications.Care Instructions: Machine wash cold / Gentle Wash with similar colors Non-chlorine bleach when needed, for whites only Tumble dry normal low heat Iron on low heat on reverse side if needed Sustainability Eco-fiber > Organic Yarn Organic yarn, which is certified organic, is spun from fiber that is produced without the use of man-made chemicals such as herbicides and pesticides. Recommended Use Sweatshirts
